desc: Zizia Botanicals is an herbalist-formulated and founded company based in Los Angeles. Specializing in organic natural clean skincare, herbal tinctures, and herbal powders. Organic adaptogens, sleep aids, mushrooms, serums, and tinctures. Reishi. Ashwagandha. Valerian. Tulsi. Lion's Mane. Cordyceps. Schisandra. And more
